io.github.splotycode.mosaik.automatisation.crawler

Interface Crawler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataFactoryComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CrawlerApplicationType

    public interface Crawler
extends DataFactoryComponent
    Main Interface for crawler Lets you create costom crawlers
